# Fortress of the Mind (Feat)
## Overview
Your intellect, wisdom and insight combined to give you an unmatched resolve.

**Prerequisites:** Int 13+.

**Benefit:** You may add your Intelligence bonus to Will power saves in addition to your Wisdom. 

**Source:** Feats (AEG), pg. 39
